author: bodewig
msg: Add filepath attribute/element to available to search for a file in a
given path - handy if you want to search for an executable for example.

author: bodewig
msg: In some cases DirectoryScanner could miss included files/directories.

author: conor
msg: Allow policy file to exist outside of Weblogic Home

author: conor
msg: Use /nul when checkign for the existence of directories on Windows
(Although it doesn't work if the directory name is quoted - woohoo)
Check for Ant in C:\Ant for Windows 9X users
Based on suggestion by eswierk@cs.stanford.edu (Ed Swierk)

author: bodewig
msg: Make <apply> work really parallel and not parallel on a per fileset basis.
Merge <apply> and <execon> into a single task (and keep Transform as
an empty class for backwards compatibility at the source level).
